newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico livestock report, feeder export price -USDA.
newsitem.headline: Mexico livestock report, feeder export price -USDA.

text.p: USDA reported Wednesday that around 1,150 head were exported into the United States at two crossing points Tuesday.

Through Nogales, Arizona, around 950 head were sold at prices 1-2 cents/lb for steer calves, the USDA said. Prices were 90-100 cents/lb for head weighing 300-400 lb and for 400-500 ln head they were 80-90 cents/lb.
Through, Del Rio, Texas, around 200 were sold, although not enough to establish trend prices.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom (525) 7289530. E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com))
